headline: Goldman Sachs Legal Chief Exit Puts Governance And Culture Under Spotlight
summary: Goldman Sachs Group (NYSE:GS) announced the resignation of its general counsel and chief legal officer, Kathryn Ruemmler. The move follows the release of Justice Department documents that detail her close personal relationship with Jeffrey Epstein. The documents describe extensive correspondence and gift exchanges that extended beyond a standard professional interaction. The resignation has triggered scrutiny of governance, compliance oversight, and reputational risk at the firm. For...
